duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervising assigned shifts, and providing supervision to crew members in the absence of the General Manager.
Completing administrative tasks such as financial and inventory control, schedules, logging maintenance, etc.
Creating and ensuring exceptional guest experiences.
Ensuring compliance with all security, food safety, quality, and cleanliness standards.
Maintaining cost controls and contributing to the sales/profit goals.
Building skills and leveraging available tools to prepare for a future General Manager role.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (GED) preferred.
Serve Safe Certificate at time of hire or obtain a Serve Safe Certificate and pass the EPL Food Safety Audit (FSA) class upon hire, where applicable.
